message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!

I'll meet you halfway, but I'm not giving up yet!

I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'll give you 420k, but I'm getting closer to my goal!
I'll give you a better deal, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'll give you 380k, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'll give you a better deal, but I'm running out of time!
I'll give you 340k, it's my final offer!
